description: Mobile techniques used by Tangelo, ATT&CK software S0329 (v1.2)
name: Tangelo (S0329)

techniques.comment: [Tangelo](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0329) contains functionality to record calls as well as the victim device's environment.(Citation: Lookout-StealthMango)
[Tangelo](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0329) accesses browser history, pictures, and videos.(Citation: Lookout-StealthMango)
[Tangelo](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0329) contains functionality to gather GPS coordinates.(Citation: Lookout-StealthMango)
[Tangelo](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0329) contains functionality to gather call logs.(Citation: Lookout-StealthMango)
[Tangelo](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0329) contains functionality to gather SMS messages.(Citation: Lookout-StealthMango)
[Tangelo](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0329) accesses databases from WhatsApp, Viber, Skype, and Line.(Citation: Lookout-StealthMango)
[Tangelo](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0329) contains functionality to gather cellular IDs.(Citation: Lookout-StealthMango)
